title: Kubernetes (Local Dev)
description: Kubernetes client tooling and cluster interaction UX.
notes: Cluster flavor is a one-of; the non-chosen one can be offered as SHOULD.

tools.name: kubectl
tools.rationale: Primary CLI to interact with Kubernetes clusters.

tools.name: helm
tools.rationale: Package manager for Kubernetes applications using charts.

tools.name: k9s
tools.rationale: TUI for managing Kubernetes resources interactively.

tools.name: stern
tools.rationale: Tail logs from multiple Kubernetes pods with label selectors.

tools.name: kubectx
tools.rationale: Simplifies context switching between Kubernetes clusters.
